channel.title: XBOX 360 Skill Cape
channel.description:
My XBOX 360 Skill Cape... I'll be making a PS3 one and alot of other Console Capes.
99.9% Credits to JaGeX for making the Default Skill Cape Model... and 00.1% for Myself for Recoloring and Adding the XBOX Logo
Here's the XBOX 360 "Wear" Cape: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/356315933/Xbox_360_Skill_Cape.rar]http://rapidshare.com/files/356315933/Xbox_360_Skill_Cape.rar[/url]
Here's the XBOX 360 "Drop" Cape: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/356320477/Xbox_360_Skill_CapeDROP.mqo]http://rapidshare.com/files/356320477/Xbox_360_Skill_CapeDROP.mqo[/url]
[img]http://C:\Users\Tiffany\Pictures\Xbox_skill_cape_picture.jpg[/img]
PLEASE COMMENT!!!

item.title: XBOX 360 Skill Cape
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:43, topic:330919”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=427291.msg3339846#msg3339846 date=1284257069]

Okay, I think we should ban all post of Jagex related items on this fourms.

It is like me buying a car and painting it, Now turing around putting my name on it.
Did I make the car? No. All I did was modifie it TO THE LEAST I COULD.
Jagex modified items take no skill, time, or effort to make. You just goto Mat -> Prop -> Select some colours, And then you apply, save, .dat, .gzip, add to server. Then run it.

Also, Not ONLY are you using a Jagex model, You are using the XBOX 360° Why did I say 360° Because, Thats what you wanna do after a week of buying it, Turn right back and sell it. YOU KNOW IT’S TRUE.

Also, No credits to Jagex? If that is so. Then you are stealing their model even further.

I’m pretty sure 360° is a complete circle.
[/quote]
I’m pretty sure you have no idea what the fuck you did and are now going to be flamed.[/quote]

It’s funny because I don’t care if I get flamed over the internet because it has no affect on my life.

Read full topic

the request is to have another “child board” section thing for recolors ONLY
so it’d be a load off of alot of our minds
we wouldnt have to enter a thread and then discover it’s another crappy recolor,
don’t take me wrong, some recolors are good,
but when people start doing the same thing over and over again… then it gets boring…
like really,
how many skillcape recolors have there been?
if you have one, then keep it to yourself,
only use it for you server, please don’t spam it here :[[/quote]STOP WRITING THOSE FUCKING LONG TEXTS AND WRITE IN NORMAL LINES ********* **** ****

item.title: XBOX 360 Skill Cape
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“Rawrock, post:29, topic:330919”][quote author=WhiteWolves link=topic=427291.msg3138753#msg3138753 date=1267296603]
i just made a topic in the “request sections”
the request is to have another “child board” section thing for recolors ONLY
so it’d be a load off of alot of our minds
we wouldnt have to enter a thread and then discover it’s another crappy recolor,
don’t take me wrong, some recolors are good,
but when people start doing the same thing over and over again… then it gets boring…
like really,
how many skillcape recolors have there been?
if you have one, then keep it to yourself,
only use it for you server, please don’t spam it here :[
[/quote]

If you guys really want to argue, why don’t you add my on facebook?
then post the crap your saying. Like it’s been said. We can post “Recolors” if we want to. But it’s not just Recolored! Recolored capes are something to be bored at because it’s nothing special. To put a logo on it is something completely different. Overall. You guys don’t know if he made that cape from scratch. You don’t know if he is using a premade model. YOU DON’T KNOW THAT! So leave him the alone![/quote]
But you see, we do. In fact, it was posted that he used the jagex model base.

devinheaven:

99.9% Credits to JaGeX for making the Default Skill Cape Model… and 00.1% for Myself for Recoloring and Adding the XBOX Logo
